title: Interview: Tariq Thachil on the challenges of studying India in the US
summary: 'I'd be hard pressed to find a book coming out of the US that offers us a great explanation of what might be the most significant political development in India in the past decade.'

title: There are now more than half a billion mobile money accounts in the world, mostly in Africa — here's why this matters
summary: Mobile money allows people without banks to securely transfer funds via text message, and its adoption is growing rapidly.

title: Tariffs are shifting global supply chains
summary: Trump's 90-day pause on his sweeping tariffs plan is about to expire. But already some firms are radically changing how they work.

title: Why Building Smarter EDA Tools Is Key To Winning The AI Era
summary: If AI is the gold prize, AI-enabled EDA tools are the picks and shovels. Why traditional chip design tools are stuck in the past, and how new AI-first EDA approaches could be critical to the AI boom.

summary: Originally published: July 2025 During the past year or so, the Bitcoin ecosystem has largely been led by the rise of corporate bitcoin treasury strategies. Although Strategy (MSTR) pioneered the trend back in 2020, the follow-on adoption by others was slow.
